subprocess_flow.description: The System Team prepares the demo environment by ensuring all necessary components are correctly configured and running. This includes deploying the latest build, configuring necessary data, and verifying network connectivity. A stable and representative environment is crucial for a successful demo.
subprocess_flow.purpose: To ensure a stable and representative environment for the system demo.
end_conditions: Demo environment is fully configured and tested
governance_requirements: Change management approval for environment changes

change_management.versioning_rules: Version control for environment configuration scripts

subprocess_flow.description: The System Team develops a demo script that showcases the integrated system functionality and highlights key features. This script should be concise, engaging, and tailored to the interests of the stakeholders. The script should also include contingency plans for potential issues that may arise during the demo.
success_criteria: Demo script is concise and engaging
subprocess_flow.purpose: To create a structured and engaging presentation of the system functionality.
end_conditions: Demo script is finalized and approved

subprocess_flow.description: The System Team conducts dry runs of the demo to identify and resolve any potential issues. This includes practicing the demo script, verifying environment stability, and testing contingency plans. Dry runs are essential for ensuring a smooth and professional demo.
success_criteria: Environment is stable during the demo
Contingency plans are tested and effective
subprocess_flow.purpose: To identify and resolve any potential issues before the actual demo.
end_conditions: Dry runs are completed and all issues are resolved

step_risks_and_controls.control: Multiple dry runs with different team members

subprocess_flow.description: The System Team presents the system demo to stakeholders, showcasing the integrated system functionality and highlighting key features. This includes following the demo script, engaging with the audience, and addressing any questions or concerns. A professional and engaging presentation is crucial for gathering valuable feedback.
success_criteria: Stakeholders are engaged and provide feedback
subprocess_flow.purpose: To showcase the integrated system functionality and gather feedback from stakeholders.
end_conditions: Demo is completed and stakeholder feedback is received

subprocess_flow.description: The System Team actively gathers feedback from stakeholders following the system demo. This includes soliciting feedback on the system functionality, user interface, and overall value. Gathering comprehensive feedback is crucial for identifying areas for improvement and ensuring that the system meets the needs of its users.
success_criteria: Feedback is gathered from all key stakeholders
Feedback is comprehensive and addresses key areas
subprocess_flow.purpose: To collect comprehensive feedback from stakeholders to identify areas for improvement.
end_conditions: Stakeholder feedback is compiled and summarized

step_risks_and_controls.control: Structured feedback forms and follow-up interviews

subprocess_flow.description: The System Team analyzes the stakeholder feedback to identify potential issues and areas for improvement. This includes categorizing feedback, prioritizing issues, and developing action plans. Analyzing feedback and identifying improvements is crucial for ensuring that the system continuously evolves to meet the needs of its users.
success_criteria: Action plans are developed for key issues
Backlog items are updated to reflect feedback
subprocess_flow.purpose: To analyze stakeholder feedback and identify actionable improvements for the system.
end_conditions: Feedback is analyzed, and action plans are developed

step_risks_and_controls.control: Cross-validation with stakeholders and product owners

governance_requirements: Documentation of feedback analysis and action plans
